Package sph.event

Contains generic interfaces and implementations for an event handling system.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    EventListener<E,S,D>
    Interface shared by all listeners handled in an BasicEventManager object.
    EventManager<E,S,D,L extends EventListener<E,S,D>>
    Generic event manager interface.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BasicEventManager<E,S,D,L extends EventListener<E,S,D>>
    Generic event manager class.
    WeakrefEventManager<E,S,D>
    Generic event manager class.

Package sph.event Description

Contains generic interfaces and implementations for an event handling system.
